frameset.edef: to practice astrology, to tell the future

example.parse: (TOP (PP-PRP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN شان) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART ما)) (IV3MS+IV يِسِيب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1P نا)) (PRT (NEG_PART ش)) (PP (PREP لِ) (NP (NOUN ظُنُونّ) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))))))) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_1P إِحْنا)) (ADVP (ADV بَرْضُه)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART مِش)) (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV1P+IV نِنَجِّم) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))))
